means: 罗密欧（莎士比亚悲剧<罗密欧与朱丽叶>中的男主人公），痴情男子，玩弄女性的色情骗子

sentence.Network_en: They will dance two performances of Ashton's "Romeo and Juliet".
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将表演阿什顿的《罗密欧与朱丽叶》中的两场舞。

sentence.Network_en: Romeo left the stage, to enthusiastic applause.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗密欧在热烈的掌声中离开了舞台。

entry.tran: 热恋中的男子;风流的男人;好色之徒
entry.def: You can describe a man as a Romeo if you want to indicate that he is very much in love with a woman, or that he frequently has sexual relationships with different women.

example.ex: Asked if any other children were planned, the 54-year-old Romeo said: 'Maybe, I dunno.'
example.tran: 当问到有没有计划再生孩子时，这位热恋中的54岁男子说：“也许吧，我不知道。”
